```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(xtable.comment = FALSE,echo = FALSE,comment=NA,message=FALSE, warning=FALSE)
```

\pagestyle{plain}



```{r f1,results="asis"}

source("Report.r")
     
library(knitr)
library(data.table)
library(xtable)
options(xtable.comment = FALSE,xtable.table.placement="!h")



   for (csv in dir(pattern = ".csv$"))
   {
     reportParams =ReportParameters$new(dataFile=csv, showOriginal = TRUE,extractedTextLength=85L, instancesToShow=100L )
     report<-Report$new(reportParams)
     
     
     safeDataFileName<-gsub('_', ' ', reportParams$dataFile)

cat("\n\n\\clearpage\n")
     
cat('\n##', paste(reportParams$dataFile), '\n')
     
print(xtable(report$ShowTotalsdt(),align= c("|p{0cm}|", "p{6cm}|" ,"p{11cm}|"),caption=paste0(safeDataFileName," Total PHI Identifier Counts")),include.rownames=FALSE,caption.placement = "top")

if(nrow(report$getSurgicalNumbers())>0){
  
  
  cat("\n\n\\clearpage\n")
  cat('\n###', paste(reportParams$dataFile, "Surgical Numbers"), '\n')
  
 tab<- xtable(as.data.table(head(report$getSurgicalNumbers()[,c("rownumber","obfuscatedtext")],n=reportParams$instancesToShow)),caption=paste0(safeDataFileName, " Surgical Numbers"),align= c("p{0cm}|", "p{2cm}|" ,"p{15cm}|"))
  names(tab) <- c('Row','Text' )
  print(tab,include.rownames=FALSE,caption.placement = "top" )
}

if(nrow(report$getPatientIdentifiers())>0){
  cat("\n\n\\clearpage\n")
    cat('\n###', paste(reportParams$dataFile, "Patient Identifiers"), '\n')
 tab<- xtable(as.data.table(head(report$getPatientIdentifiers()[,c("rownumber","obfuscatedtext")],n=reportParams$instancesToShow)),caption=paste0(safeDataFileName, " Patient Identifiers"),align= c("p{0cm}|", "p{2cm}|" ,"p{15cm}|"))
  names(tab) <- c('Row','Text' )
  print(tab,include.rownames=FALSE,caption.placement = "top" )
}


if(nrow(report$getNameChanges())>0){
  cat("\n\n\\clearpage\n")
 cat('\n###', paste(reportParams$dataFile, "Name Changes"), '\n')
 tab<- xtable(as.data.table(head(report$getNameChanges()[,c("rownumber","obfuscatedtext")],n=reportParams$instancesToShow)),caption=paste0(safeDataFileName, " Name Changes"),align= c("p{0cm}|", "p{2cm}|" ,"p{15cm}|"))
  names(tab) <- c('Row','Text' )
  print(tab,include.rownames=FALSE,caption.placement = "top" )
}

if(nrow(report$getpatientDateOfBirth())>0)
{
  cat("\n\n\\clearpage\n")
   cat('\n###', paste(reportParams$dataFile, "Date Of Birth"), '\n')
 tab<- xtable(as.data.table(head(report$getpatientDateOfBirth()[,c("rownumber","obfuscatedtext")],n=50)),caption=paste0(safeDataFileName, " Patient Date Of Birth"),align= c("p{0cm}|", "p{2cm}|" ,"p{15cm}|"))
  names(tab) <- c('Row','Text' )
  print(tab,include.rownames=FALSE,caption.placement = "top" )
}

if(nrow(report$getPatDates())>0)
{
  cat("\n\n\\clearpage\n")
   cat('\n###', paste(reportParams$dataFile, "Patient Dates"), '\n')
 tab<- xtable(as.data.table(head(report$getPatDates()[,c("rownumber","patient draw date")],n=50)),caption=paste0(safeDataFileName, " Patient Draw Dates"),align= c("p{0cm}|", "p{2cm}|" ,"p{15cm}|"))
  print(tab,include.rownames=FALSE,caption.placement = "top" )
}

  
if(nrow(report$getPatAgeOverMax())>0)
{
  cat("\n\n\\clearpage\n")
   cat('\n###', paste(reportParams$dataFile, "Patient Over Age Max"), '\n')
 tab<- xtable(as.data.table(head(report$getPatAgeOverMax()[,c("rownumber","patient age over max")],n=50)),caption=paste0(safeDataFileName, " Examples Of Patient Age Over Max"),align= c("p{0cm}|", "p{2cm}|" ,"p{15cm}|"))
  print(tab,include.rownames=FALSE,caption.placement = "top" )
}

  
if(nrow(report$getValidZipCodes())>0)
{
  cat("\n\n\\clearpage\n")
   cat('\n###', paste(reportParams$dataFile, "Valid Zip Codes"), '\n')
 tab<- xtable(as.data.table(head(report$getValidZipCodes()[,c("rownumber","patient address postal code")],n=50)),caption=paste0(safeDataFileName, " Valid Zip Codes"),align= c("p{0cm}|", "p{2cm}|" ,"p{15cm}|"))
  print(tab,include.rownames=FALSE,caption.placement = "top" )
}


     
   }
```
